thread.title: Zangief returns! The Red Cyclone to be in Street Fighter V
thread.title_full: Zangief returns! The Red Cyclone to be in Street Fighter V

author: News Zombie
title: Zangief returns! The Red Cyclone to be in Street Fighter V
text:
Posted on October 1, 2015 in PC News , PlayStation 4 News 
Another Street Fighter II veteran has made their way onto the roster of Street Fighter V. Capcom announced at IgroMir in Russia that Zangief is the latest addition to the cast. A new trailer and set of screenshots were also released, some of which show off his V-Skill, Iron Muscle, and his V-Trigger, Cyclone Lariat. Looks like all that bear wrestling has paid off. 
Street Fighter V is scheduled to launch spring 2016 for PC and PS4.
